properties.name: saunah.frontend.baseurl
properties.description: Base URL of the frontend. Used to correctly handle CORS.

properties.name: saunah.email.from.email
properties.description: The email address which is listed as the sender.

properties.name: saunah.email.from.reply-to
properties.description: The email address which will be added as reply to.

properties.name: saunah.email.from.name
properties.description: The name which is listed as the sender name.

properties.name: saunah.credentials.google-service
properties.description: Google service account json credentials, base64 encoded.

properties.name: saunah.extra-allowed-cors
properties.description: Comma separated list of additional allowed CORS urls.'

properties.name: saunah.object-storage.enable
properties.description: Enable the use of object storage for images. If disabled, uses local storage.

properties.name: saunah.object-storage.bucket.secret-key
properties.description: Seret key for authenticating access to object storage.

properties.name: saunah.object-storage.bucket.access-key
properties.description: Access key for authenticating to object storage.

properties.name: saunah.object-storage.bucket.endpoint
properties.description: Endpoint of the object storage bucket to use.

properties.name: saunah.object-storage.bucket.id
properties.description: ID of the object storage bucket to use.

properties.name: saunah.object-storage.bucket.region
properties.description: Region of the object storage bucket to use.
